entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
